name: Animal Sounds
description: Recordings which are done in order to capture sounds produced by animals.

children.name: Bird Sounds
children.description: Recordings of birds, including vocalizations (songs and calls) and mechanical sounds produced by bills, wings, or feathers.

children.name: Insect Sounds
children.description: Recordings that capture the sounds produced by insects.

children.name: Whale Song
children.description: Low-frequency, complex vocalizations produced by baleen whales.
